title: ICC Champions Trophy 2025 India Squad Announcement LIVE Updates: Ajit Agarkar likely to announce squad today | Mint - Mint
summary:
ICC Champions Trophy 2025 India Squad Announcement LIVE Updates

Publication Date: 18 Jan 2025

Source: Various Updates

As the ICC Champions Trophy approaches, India and Pakistan remain the last teams to announce their player squads. The BCCI is waiting on the conclusion of the Vijay Hazare Trophy to finalize their 15-man squad, and injury issues are causing further delays.

  • The announcement of India’s squad is expected to happen on January 18, 2025.
  • Key player injuries, particularly to Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav, are influencing the squad selection process.
  • Notable comments from former cricketers highlight the impact of team dynamics and player evaluations.
“My recovery went quite well and I’ve been bowling for some time now. I’m feeling good about my progress.” - Kuldeep Yadav

In summary, the Indian cricket team is undergoing key evaluations and discussions, making the squad announcement a subject of significant anticipation.
newTitle: ICC Champions Trophy 2025 India Squad Announcement LIVE Updates

Sydney washout puts Hurricanes, Sixers in Qualifier - ESPNcricinfo
summary:
Sydney washout puts Hurricanes, Sixers in Qualifier

Publication Date: Not specified Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Wild weather at the SCG disrupted a BBL match, resulting in a washout that confirmed Hobart Hurricanes' top spot and set up a Qualifier against Sydney Sixers.

  • Sydney Thunder faced Sydney Sixers in a match that was ultimately abandoned due to severe weather.
  • The washout did not allow for the decision review technology to be set up.
  • Hobart Hurricanes topped the BBL points table, while Sydney Sixers finished second.
  • Fans were evacuated from two bays due to roofing damage prior to the game.
  • Only 5.1 overs were bowled before rain halted the match.
  • Jordan Silk from the Sixers expressed excitement about the upcoming Qualifier against the Hurricanes.
"It's a position we've been in before where we've had to travel away for a qualifier. I think the group's excited by the opportunity that's going to present to us down in Hobart." - Jordan Silk

The Hurricanes have an opportunity to secure their first title if they win against the Sixers in the upcoming match.
newTitle: Sydney washout puts Hurricanes, Sixers in Qualifier

Sanju Samson Excluded from India's Champions Trophy Squad Amid Strong T20I Performance

Publication Date: Jan 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Sanju Samson has been performing exceptionally well in T20 internationals, scoring three centuries in his last five innings. Despite this, he may not be included in India's squad for the Champions Trophy, according to Harbhajan Singh.

  • Samson has a T20I average of 56 and three recent centuries.
  • His lack of participation in the Vijay Hazare Trophy may affect his selection.
  • Harbhajan Singh believes that performance in one format should be considered for other formats.
  • Samson's exemplifying performance brings into question the selectors' decision-making processes.
“If a person is scoring three centuries in five matches, that means that he is in a zone where he can't be stopped.” - Harbhajan Singh

The discussion around Samson's exclusion raises questions about the criteria utilized for selection, particularly when considering a player's performance in varying formats.

title: Who is Priya Saroj, Samajwadi Party MP rumoured to be engaged to Indian cricketer Rinku Singh? - Hindustan Times
summary:
Who is Priya Saroj, Samajwadi Party MP Engaged to Cricketer Rinku Singh?

Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Several media reports have emerged claiming Samajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj to have been engaged to Indian cricketer Rinku Singh.

  • Priya Saroj is a sitting Lok Sabha MP from Machhlishahr, Uttar Pradesh, and belongs to the Samajwadi Party.
  • She holds a degree in Law (LLB) from Amity University, Noida.
  • In the 2024 Lok Sabha elections, she defeated BJP's sitting MP by 35,850 votes.
  • Her father, Tufani Saroj, is a senior SP leader and current MLA.
  • She serves on the parliamentary committee on social justice and empowerment.
“Rinku Singh has played 30 T20 international matches for India, scoring 507 runs.”

The engagement remains unconfirmed by both families.
newTitle: Who is Priya Saroj, Samajwadi Party MP Engaged to Cricketer Rinku Singh?

title: Rinku Singh Engaged To Samajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj? Woman's Father Breaks Silence - NDTV Sports
summary:
Rinku Singh Engaged To Samajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj? Woman's Father Breaks Silence

Publication Date: January 17, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Rumors about Indian cricket player Rinku Singh's engagement to Priya Saroj, a Samajwadi Party MP, have been dismissed by Saroj's father, Tufani Saroj. He confirmed that while discussions are ongoing between the families, the engagement has not taken place.

  • Tufani Saroj called the news of the engagement "completely wrong."
  • Priya Saroj is currently in Thiruvananthapuram and has not been engaged to Rinku Singh.
  • There are ongoing talks between the two families regarding future possibilities.
  • Priya Saroj is a Lok Sabha MP from Machhlishahr constituency and has a strong political background.
  • Rinku Singh is set to play in the upcoming T20I series against England, starting January 22.
"Priya is in Thiruvananthapuram at the moment for some work and no, her engagement with Rinku Singh has not happened." - Tufani Saroj

The rumors surrounding Rinku Singh’s engagement may have generated excitement but have now been clarified by family statements.
newTitle: Rinku Singh's Engagement Rumors with Priya Saroj Addressed by Her Father

Concerns surround the fitness of key players Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav ahead of the Champions Trophy, as selections are influenced by their recovery statuses.

title: 'I didn’t leave Barcelona to be the best in the world at PSG. Messi asked, "Why are you leaving?" I told him it's something personal': Neymar reveals why he made record-breaking 2017 transfer - FourFourTwo
summary:
Neymar Explains His Record-Breaking Transfer from Barcelona to PSG

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: FourFourTwo

Neymar has opened up about his 2017 transfer to Paris Saint-Germain, revealing that his decision was based on personal reasons and the desire to play alongside his fellow Brazilian teammates.

  • Neymar completed a record-breaking £200m move from Barcelona to PSG in 2017.
  • He did not leave Barcelona solely to become the best player in the world but for personal reasons.
  • Playing with more Brazilian players at PSG attracted him to the club.
  • Neymar emphasized the importance of teamwork over individual ego in achieving success.
  • He discussed his relationship with Kylian Mbappe and the dynamics when Lionel Messi joined PSG.
Neymar stated, "I didn’t leave Barca to be the best in the world at PSG. Messi asked, 'Why are you leaving?' I told him, 'No, it’s not that, it’s something personal.'"

Neymar's insights reveal that personal connections and the opportunity to collaborate with friends were significant factors in his transfer decision.
newTitle: Neymar Explains His Record-Breaking Transfer from Barcelona to PSG

summary:
Australian Open 2025: Day 6 Highlights and Results

Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Wide World of Sports

Day six of the Australian Open showcased thrilling matches with top players advancing, including Novak Djokovic and Aryna Sabalenka. Notably, Naomi Osaka retired from the tournament.

  • Aryna Sabalenka (1) defeated Clara Tauson: 7-6 (5), 6-4
  • Carlos Alcaraz (3) defeated Nuno Borges: 6-2, 6-4, 6-7 (3), 6-2
  • Novak Djokovic (7) defeated Tomas Machac (26): 6-1, 6-4, 6-4
  • Coco Gauff (3) defeated Leylah Fernandez: 6-4, 6-2
  • Jack Draper (15) defeated Aleksandar Vukic: 6-4, 2-6, 5-7, 7-6(5), 7-6(8)
  • Belinda Bencic advanced after Naomi Osaka retired via walkover.
“It was not all smooth sailing with Djokovic combatting an ailment.”

The day concluded with excitement for the upcoming matches as Alex de Minaur remains the last Australian in the main draws.
newTitle: Australian Open 2025: Day 6 Highlights and Results

title: Australian Open 2025, day six RECAP: New feat reached at Melbourne Park after Jack Draper overcomes second Aussie in another five-set epic - Nine
Unfazed Seales over-delivers in spin-friendly Multan - ESPNcricinfo
summary:
Jayden Seales Excels in Challenging Conditions in Multan

Publication Date: Not provided, Source: ESPNcricinfo

In a challenging match at Multan, Jayden Seales, the only fast bowler for West Indies, impressively performed despite adverse conditions favoring spin bowlers.

  • Pakistan prepared the pitch to aid spin bowling, but Seales made a strong impact.
  • The match was delayed by four hours due to fog and cold temperatures.
  • Seales took key wickets, including Kamran Ghulam and Babar Azam, exhibiting skillful seam movement.
  • Seales reflected on the importance of building pressure and adapting to conditions specific to Asia.
  • Despite being the only fast bowler, Seales did not feel pressured and focused on doing his best for the team.

"As a fast bowler, I always wanted to get a wicket or be in the game and it so happened that I got the wickets for the team today." Seales after the opening day

Seales showed resilience and adaptability, over-delivering in a setting designed to challenge fast bowlers.
newTitle: Jayden Seales Excels in Challenging Conditions in Multan

title: "Scoring 752 In 7 Innings..." Sachin Tendulkar's Message In Karun Nair Post Is For All To See - NDTV Sports
summary:
Sachin Tendulkar's Praise for Karun Nair's Extraordinary Performances

Publication Date: January 17, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Sachin Tendulkar lauded Vidarbha batter Karun Nair amid his remarkable performance in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.

  • Karun Nair has scored an impressive 752 runs in 7 innings with an average of 752.00.
  • He has recorded five centuries and one fifty, with his highest score being 163*.
  • Nair's strike rate stands at 125.96, showcasing his aggressive batting style.
  • Sachin Tendulkar emphasized the importance of hard work and focus in achieving such success.
  • Nair led his team Vidarbha to victory in the semifinal against Maharashtra with an unbeaten 88 off 44 balls.
  • If he scores 79 more runs, he will break the tournament's all-time record of 830 runs held by Narayan Jagadeesan.
Scoring 752 runs in 7 innings with 5 centuries is nothing short of extraordinary, @karun126. Performances like these don't just happen, they come from immense focus and hard work. Keep going strong and make every opportunity count!

Sachin Tendulkar's remarks reflect the high expectations and recognition Nair receives in the cricketing world, sparking discussions about his potential return to the Indian national team.
newTitle: Sachin Tendulkar's Praise for Karun Nair's Extraordinary Performances
